title: College-Related Tax Deductions or Credits: Are You Eligible?
sub_head: You might be, but the rules can get tricky. Here is a rundown.
body:
Families with college students might be eligible for certain tax deductions or credits on their 2021 taxes. But accounting for them properly can be a challenge.
That is because the rules are complicated and taxpayers generally canâ€™t claim more than one benefit for the same qualifying education expense. Here are some things to consider:
